Mendokusai

Tartarus

Priorities

[ ]

10 Apr 2018

Today, in my latest (likely futile) attempt to solve my life problems with a spreadsheet, I created a "fuck allocation" sheet, a la Mark Manson. Seeing all my life priorities set out and being able to assign weights to them was pretty interesting, and it was a difficult exercise to complete. Perhaps that is why I struggle to know what I want - I am trying to prioritise far too many things at once.
